code: @Test public void stopsMeterRegistryWhenContextIsClosed() {     this.contextRunner.withUserConfiguration(BaseConfiguration.class).run((context) -> {         InfluxMeterRegistry registry = context.getBean(InfluxMeterRegistry.class).         assertThat(registry.isClosed()).isFalse().         context.close().         assertThat(registry.isClosed()).isTrue().     }). }
@Bean public InfluxMeterRegistry customRegistry(InfluxConfig config, Clock clock) {     return new InfluxMeterRegistry(config, clock). }
